Hi 
I have a requirement like I have described below. Please suggest me the=

My objective in brief:
1. Obtain the test method=
 execution time which EXCLUDES setup and teardown time.
2. Facilitate warm =
runs for the method. Run the same method more than once. B
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=
=A0 (I dont have a problem in getting the iterations from a configuration f=
ile)
(Warm tests are facilitated as=C2=A0jvm takes sometime to load the cla=
ss for the very first run)

ce code. Which I dont think is the best way, as and when a new version of j=
unit come in... I should be spending time to identify the instrumentaiton p=
oints and modify it. Which is not feasible.

gest a better way to achieve this..?
